properties.Title: NATO Headquarters
properties.Desc: My six months internship plans turned into a longer journey at NATO and so far, I'm enjyoing every second of it. Here, I've worked on amazing projects as improving an operational support software in collaboration with an amazing civil-military joint team. Currently, I'm working with a different (yet again amazing) team where I focus more on the high-level business strategy development and stakeholder management aspects of a large-scale digital transformation project.

properties.Title: ''It doesn't take an army! It takes a few good people.''
properties.Desc: This was my former boss' motto and the exact definition of my team at Solvoyo. Being the COO of a high-tech start-up, Nilufer has always been a great mentor and source of inspiration for me. Not only she has always encouraged me to push my limits and grow in multiple domains, but also has put her trust in me and stood by me just like a true leader. Albeit, it's ironic to join NATO given the ''It does not take an army!'' Maybe it's true though, instead of one, it takes thirty of them!
